title: 03/04/2021 - HOUR 2 - Steelers, draft, Wilson
itunes:title: 03/04/2021 - HOUR 2 - Steelers, draft, Wilson
description:
The Steelers have given Big Ben a contract extension

Colin has a mock NBA All-Star draft

More on the Seahawks looking into trading Russell Wilson


Guest: Chris Broussard
